entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Performance degraded when migrated from EF2 to EF6 #27939
  • TypeInitialization_Type, Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.EvaluatableExpressionFilter: Could not find property 'Now' on type 'System.DateTimeOffset' when trimmed #27936
  • Query: Consider having predicate on SqlEnumerableExpression so providers can integrate it accordingly #27935
  • Metadata: Add support for adding UDF which are aggregate #27934
  • Lift GroupBy aggregate chain with navigation expansion into aggregate term #27933

Closed

  • OnModelCreating(ModelBuilder modelBuilder) is triggered twice by dbContext.Database.EnsureCreated() #27921

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27944
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27943
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Allow to set provider value comparer when configuring value conversion #27942
  • Update test instructions and remove 2.2 #27938

Merged

  • Update branding to 3.1.26 #27940
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.6 #27941
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.6
  • [Typo] Cleanup trailing end tag in documentation #27937
    auto-merge, community-contribution

Updated

  • Query: Translate aggregate over grouping element in separate pass #27931
    providers-beware
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient and SQLitePCLRaw #27932
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Refactor UpdateSqlGenerator to separate select logic #27902
